option.name: VM_OPTIONS
option.value: -Xms1024m -Xmx4096m # <------ increase this to most of your RAM -XX:MaxPermSize=1024m -XX:ReservedCodeCacheSize=440m -XX:+UseCompressedOops -XX:-HeapDumpOnOutOfMemoryError -Dfile.encoding=UTF-8

option.name: PROGUARD_VM_OPTIONS
option.value: -Xms1024m -Xmx4096m # <------ increase this to most of your RAM -XX:MaxPermSize=1024m -XX:ReservedCodeCacheSize=440m -XX:+UseCompressedOops -XX:-HeapDumpOnOutOfMemoryError -Dfile.encoding=UTF-8
